thread.title: Toni Braxton attends Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash
thread.title_full: Toni Braxton attends Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: Toni Braxton attends Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash
text:
It's a bird, it's a plan, no it is a walking fashion faux pas.
Toni Braxton made a very memorable entrance into Clive Davis' annual pre- Grammy party on Saturday night.
The 49-year-old certainly stood out in the star-studded crowd in Beverly Hills, California .
It's a bird, it's a plane... Toni Braxton made a very memorable entrance into Clive Davis' annual pre-Grammy party in Bverly Hills on Saturday night
The Breathe Again singer had everyone holding their breath praying should would not suffer a wardrobe malfunction as she headed into the party.
For the annual gala, Toni wore a sheer dress with an abstract pattern across with with a matching cape.
The dress was so see-though, the star's nude shapewear was visible, and she flashed even more skin thanks to a thigh high split,
The songstress still had more skin to show and did so thanks to the gown's very low neckline from which her unsupported bust threatened to split.
Dared to bare: The Breathe Again singer had everyone holding their breath praying should would not suffer a wardrobe malfunction as she headed into the party in a very sheer caped and dress
Little to the imagination: The dress was so see-though, the star's nude shapewear was visible, and she flashed even more skin thanks to a thigh high split
If the caped ensemble was not enough to get everyone's attention, Toni also wore dramatic over-the-top fake eyelash.
The lashes were clumped together in sections on both the top of her eyelid and the bottom.
However, while the outfit may not have look that good, Toni certainly did, which is great after her health crisis last year.
Can't miss them: If the caped ensemble was not enough to get everyone's attention, Toni also wore dramatic over-the-top fake eyelash
The Another Sad Love Song singer was hospitalized a number of times last year as she battled lupus.
Lupus is a chronic autoimmune disease that can damage a person's skin, their joints and their organs.
Toni has been trying to manage the disease for some time and has lost an uncle to lupus.
Back on track: While the outfit may not have look that good, Toni certainly did, which is great after her health crisis last year
